question.ask: Questions 1~2  Your family want to visit Beijing this summer. Ask your friend there two questions about Beijing.

std.value: How is the weather there in summer? Can you recommend some hotels in Beijing?
std.ai: How is the weather there in summer? Can you recommend some hotels in Beijing?

std.value: What places should we visit in Beijing? Which is the most convenient means of transportation?
std.ai: What places should we visit in Beijing? Which is the most convenient means of transportation?

std.value: What’s the weather like in Beijing in summer? Is it a good time to visit the Great Wall?
std.ai: What’s the weather like in Beijing in summer? Is it a good time to visit the Great Wall?

std.value: What are the most popular tourist attractions in Beijing? Are there any famous snacks we should try?
std.ai: What are the most popular tourist attractions in Beijing? Are there any famous snacks we should try?

std.value: What are the people in Beijing like? What special customs are there in Beijing?
std.ai: What are the people in Beijing like? What special customs are there in Beijing?

question.keywords: How weather in summer|Can recommend hotels|What places should visit|Which most convenient means of transportation|What’s weather like in summer|Is it good time visit the Great Wall|What most popular tourist attractions|Are there any famous snacks|What are people like|What special customs there

question.ask: Questions 3~4  You are going to buy a new watch as a birthday gift for your best friend. Ask the shop assistant two questions about the watch you’re looking at.

std.value: How much is it? Is it a mechanical one or an electronic one?
std.ai: How much is it? Is it a mechanical one or an electronic one?

std.value: What is special about the watch? Can you show me how to set the watch?
std.ai: What is special about the watch? Can you show me how to set the watch?

std.value: What is the watch made of? Is the watch waterproof?
std.ai: What is the watch made of? Is the watch waterproof?

std.value: What is the price of this watch? What are the special functions of it?
std.ai: What is the price of this watch? What are the special functions of it?

std.value: Where is the watch made? How much does it cost?
std.ai: Where is the watch made? How much does it cost?

std.value: How can the watchband be adjusted? How can it be cleaned?
std.ai: How can the watchband be adjusted? How can it be cleaned?

question.keywords: How much is it|Is it mechanical one or electronic one|What is special about watch|Can show how to set watch|What is watch made of? Is watch waterproof|What price of watch|What are special functions|Where watch made|How much does cost|How can watchband be adjusted|How can it be cleaned
